website_summaries.verdict: Children love fantasy animals (dragons, unicorns, fairies), and Glenda Glitterpoop definitely packs a dramatic punch when she shows her feisty face.
pros: Switches from cute to feisty position very easily
Appeals to adults as well as children
cons: Top heavy design, tends to tip over
Some design flaws with mechanical parts
Some versions only stick out tongue, no teeth display

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious a/o Terrifying
customer_reviews.text: These scare babies and dogs, so beware. “No teasing the dog” had to be said frequently. Most surprisingly, the 7yo listened, but the 43yo human man did not. Hmmmmmmmm. Anyway, this thing is hilarious and terrifying. My son loves it, but does not want it in his bed at night. It makes everyone smile and is a good tool for converting anger or upset (for a kid who has trouble expressing emotion - this is awesome!)
customer_reviews.author: heidi leah ring

customer_reviews.title: Mangy faceplanting disappointment
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE design. It is too top heavy to sit up on its own, once you let go of the toy, it immediately faceplants. The hair is also really mangy looking. I will be returning this toy immediately as it is not worth anywhere near $35. After seeing this thing in person I can’t say I would be willing to pay $10 for it. It’s inability to sit upright also explains why it is only sold online!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Doan

customer_reviews.title: I got this funny little toy for my daughter's 10th birthday and she ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this funny little toy for my daughter's 10th birthday and she absolutely LOVES it. It hard to look at this stuffed animal and not laugh especially when you change its face as you squeeze behind the ears. Cute gift for any child as long as they aren't too young cause it might scare them.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Item is not as shown and cheaper elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: This item was a small cheaply made stuffed animal that looked nothing like the picture. It cost me $35 the next day it was listed at $21. Don't buy this because it's nothing like what is shown. Rippoff...
customer_reviews.author: 559SW

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong one.
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item... I ordered the one that shows its teeth but I received the one that sticks out its tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Mills

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great White Elephant gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and added it to a metallic silver shopping tote full of other Unicorn-themed stuff like bandages, a coloring book, and a thermos. I wrapped it and used it for a White Elephant gift exchange. The older man that chose it and unwrapped it got a kick out of it, but the women ended up fighting over the present and stealing it from one another. It was definitely a hit. The final owner of the gift has this Glenda Glitterpoop squeezable unicorn displayed proudly on her desk as work. My kids really enjoyed squeezing it's head and making it "evil."
customer_reviews.author: Lo Frenzel

customer_reviews.title: It made a little girl very scared then incredibly happy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this gift to my best friends 5yr old daughter and she loved it, not at first.... First she droped her candy and fell backwards over a cat with a very concerned look on her face. The fear promptly wore off and she spent the rest of her birthday party trying to find people who didn't know its hidden secret to terrorize and got a lot of laughs as even grandma got scared by it. They are deff a fun toy and must of have for anyone on your list who is a bit twisted, my adult friends all want one now and I even have one just cause I think its cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Neef

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother (best friend) told me that all my god-daughter wanted for Christmas was this evil little unicorn. He said he couldn't find it at any of the stores nearby. I checked Amazon and they only had a few left. BOOM! Princess gets what she wants! The future little metalhead LOVES it. Good on ya Amazon. It's great. Slight shedding straight out of the packaging but it wasn't enough to notice. Not like it's got a huge bald spot or anything. All in all it seems pretty well made for a plush. Thinking of getting her metalhead father the goat... mostly for her but she will like that daddy has one too.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: One Tough Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I saw this and just knew that my son had to have this as a graduation gift from Basic Training in the Army. He was not allowed to receive such items while in Basic, but when he got leave, you better believe he was given this little gem. It's the thought that counts, right? He liked unicorns before he went in, and I figured this one would suit his transformation into a tough guy. He was very amused. This is a fun and unique stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: K Ward

customer_reviews.title: 15 month old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This version is much smaller than the one at Target; which when I looked at it cost the same price. I regret buying it but wasn’t sure at the time it was right for my NB daughter. Flash forward 15 months and I knew it would make her happy. The scary face confused her at first but very quickly she began to love having it pretend to bite her fingers. She also loves getting into angry face and growling contests with it.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!
customer_reviews.text: The best stuffed animal I've ever been given for a gift. It's so cute and kind of pathetic looking, and one squeeze, it's the most demonic looking unicorn I've ever seen. Very well made, soft and cuddly. It's awesome for sticking in your boyfriend's face while he's asleep and waking him up to Glenda scowling at him. Just be sure that she has a soft landing across the room where she will inevitably be thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Deadgirllives

customer_reviews.title: Cute and funny, excellent for 3 / 4 / 5 year old.  Even after a year.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is excellent for my 3 and now 4 year old. She still plays with this thing and giggles every time. One of the few gifts from a year ago Christmas that she still plays with. It was hard for her at first to get the "Mean" face to show at 3, but she gained the strength and continued trying until she could. Again excellent gift for a 3 / 4 / 5 year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I think it's funny...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter, not so much. She opened the gift and thought it was cute. Of course she also thought the name was funny. But when I showed her how it worked and she flat out said "I don't like that". 🤷‍♂️ What does she know? She's 4. I say it's hilarious and you should gift it to people, maybe not small children though. Glitterpoop, ha!
customer_reviews.author: TopherT1

customer_reviews.title: Fun, unique toy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my friend's 3 y.o. and she loved it.I wish I had taped the revealing. She was scared at first and hid behind Mom, then tentatively approached it and when squeezed again she giggled. She learned how to operate it and chased her older sister around with it lol. Greatz fun toy. Very cute. It isn't very soft, so not really for snuggling.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: it just looks like it has been used
customer_reviews.text: so far havent had any issues with it sitting up on its own and it is cute however, the maine on this one is very scraggly as is the tail.. it just looks like it has been used... slightly disappointed since this is supposed to be a gift for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High cost, low quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely paying high cost just for the novelty of it. The thing doesn't sit up straight at all. It wasn't designed very well. The quality of the stuffed animal is so awful. The mane is so thin and wiry it's not pretty. Still pretty cool that it has teeth when you squeeze the head but I'm sure if played with too rough the eyebrows would just break off.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Creech

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Hit
customer_reviews.text: My six year old daughter, who is more the dragons, dinosaurs, and spooky movie watching sort of princess is somewhat hard to buy for. She likes girly things like unicorns, but she often finds the girl's section of the toy isle a snooze fest (MLP excluded.) This brought her no end of glee.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Came with HUGE hole under one arm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift so I did not open it right when it came in the mail. I held on to it until my daughter's birthday and when she opened it finally, it has a massive hole under one of the arms. I would normally just exchange it but my return window closed right before her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter like the product for the novelty factor, the quality is disappointing. The mane of the unicorn was stitched into the body. The hair is very cheap and the stitching around the mouth is coming apart upon arrival. This unicorn had less quality than stuffed animals from a crane machine. The unicorn also toppled over when standing. Size is much smaller than expected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone use this on a YouTube video and had to buy one for myself or someone. I ended up buying this for my 17 year old sister for her birthday. She LOVED it. I plan on buying one for myself someday. The only complaint I had was that the body was slightly deformed but overall everything looked and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: LOL This is pretty cool and was a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a ten year old who loves unicorns and it was so funny and she loved it. I would buy this again, it works as expected, you squeeze it and it changes from a nice loving expression to the angry looking one. It works well and doesn't get stuck in one position or the other and seems to glide easy enough from one expression to the other. It also feels like it is constructed well and serves it's purpose well. It make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Unique
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved these Feisty Pets. They operate very easily and are so unique that even adults are impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Foxworth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy for Older Kids.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in a stuffed animal. Shes Cute and Sweet but Scary at times. These are the best stuffed animals. The eye falls off sometimes, but easily clicks back on so its no big deal. Not recommended for smaller children since they could choke on the eye when it falls off, but still awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Angie D.

customer_reviews.title: They're getting cheaply made, not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of older feisty pets - they are heavy duty and after years of use, you cant feel the controls in the head. This unicorn was almost flat in the back and the controls were poking through the fabric. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 3 of these which she loves, and all work great. I bought this one (Glinda Glitterpoop) for my niece and almost right after opening her gift the mouth got stuck in the open position. We managed to get it closed but now it only partially closes, exposing the teeth at all times. Maybe this was just a defective one, as I said before the other ones I got my daughter all work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for such an expensive product
customer_reviews.text: Just came today in the mail as a Christmas present for my children. As you can see from the picture the product is still in the package and material is pulling away from under the mouth. What poor quality; especially for spending almost $26! Buyer beware....I have promptly submitted a return authorization and am getting my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ellison

customer_reviews.title: The pet I got didn't work properly. the mouth ...
customer_reviews.text: The pet I got didn't work properly. the mouth would not close back on its own. Asked for a refund and UPS lost my package. Now I'm just out of luck to get my money back. Tried several ways to communicate, ZERO.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly  King

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable toy
customer_reviews.text: My child carries this thing with her everywhere. She enjoys scaring people and animals with it and getting their surprised reaction. She did make it eat coins the other day which were a pain to get out and made the face stick in place. So please tell your children not to feed their Fiesty Pet. Also if they are like my child and enjoy it as much the white gets dirty really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this, and it scares my girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: The girlfriend is terrified of this feisty unicorn. But she is also afraid of dolls, dummys, and clowns. I knew this would scare her. But, now I have to give it away or throw it away because she can't have it in the house. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jlang

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and it does not stick its tongue out.
customer_reviews.text: One start because I couldn’t give 0 stars. I was sent one that just sticks it’s tongue out. DOES NOT SHOW ITS TEETH!! Looks very cheaply made! Would have returned it but I’ve been bitten in the rear by doing that in the past. Can’t believe I spent 38.00 on this piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: Spouse loved it, and loves unicorns. How could you Not have this in a collection. It scared the poo out of the Dog when we showed it's teeth. It's a cute little novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Might not get the scary one
customer_reviews.text: A little upset I ordered it expecting the “evil” one with the sharp scary teeth but instead received one that just sticks it’s tongue out? Cute but not what I bought. Wish the pictures in the description were more accurate
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for certain personalities
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece who is absolutely in love with it. The unicorn does look a little bit sadder in real life than in the image, but my niece really just loves it for the angry face. The rest of my family also thinks the stuffed animal is hilarious, adorable, and feisty.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: LOL, the joke was on me lol
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to scare my 4 & 5 year old nieces, lol, however, they loved it. Both kept trying to stick my finger in its mouth so that it could bite me. Should I be scared LOL LOL LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ernette aka Benie

customer_reviews.title: Real Full size Feisty pet
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, full size Feisty pet. Only negative is that it comes packaged in a flimsy cellophane bag. But the pet itself received 2 thumbs up from my wife ( it’s what she wanted-don’t ask).
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaMarc

customer_reviews.title: ... say this gift was a show stopper lol everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Needless to say this gift was a show stopper lol everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Good buy, a little over priced if you ask me. Soft except for the big thing in the back of the head you squeeze to change the face making it not a good stuffed animal to cuddle with...
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what i thought...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Unfortunently...the one i received didn't have the teeth...just sticks its tongue out. I wasn't aware of this and it was kind of important considering the recipiant of the gift would have liked it way better...why i ordered in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Angry little unicorn
customer_reviews.text: After seeing these for a gazillion dollars elsewhere, I knew I had to find one for my sweet, innocent seven year old with a twisted sense of humor. She loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the attention to detail of the toy. I loved the tag attached noting likes and dislikes (very funny). The toy did not make any sound as depicted in the video. I believe this would make the toy better and will follow-up with the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Chitlin

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my sister for Christmas and she loved it. The only problem I had with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for Christmas and she loved it. The only problem I had with this product is the tail hair had something hard in it. I am pretty sure it was attached, so I didn't want to screw with it. Hopefully, she doesn't notice, but if she does, she can mess with it. I didn't want to make it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced toy
customer_reviews.text: It looked a little worn when we received it. It can't sit up on it's own. Neither our 3 or 4 year old can operate it because the mechanism to make it snarl is so stiff. It would be cute if it was better quality. I thought it was a little bigger for how much is was.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Malone

customer_reviews.title: What the...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter conned me into buying this, she loves it and if she is happy that means I am broke! Cute toy, kids think it’s funny and play with it a lot. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Its cute
customer_reviews.text: Was marked up price wise when bought but could not find anywhere else. Quality is not what I would expect especially when it comes the purple mane. It is very frizzy instead of soft and silky. The animation is does makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Apiccoli

customer_reviews.title: Too funny!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. My friend's daughter LOVED it! Actually, so did I. It's simple, but hilarious and entertaining. Very cute! Could be scary for little ones though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Laughing at it constantly and waiting to see what my niece comes up with next. Arrived on time doesn't feel cheap all-around awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. B

customer_reviews.title: Love Glenda
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuffy. My daughter colored on it sooo she is currently not the same color haha. My friends love it also and a few have even purchased the same item yay!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! My 9 year old niece LOVED it!! Her parents not so much and I will say it is a little evil looking in person but hey it wasn’t for me and the recipient was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vampire Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my 7 yr old. She said she wanted a stuffed unicorn for her birthday. I had no intention of getting her another stuffed animal to add to the millions she already has. Then I saw this unicorn and had to get it for her. She loves it and calls it her vampire unicorn. I think it's her favorite birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anybody that wants a good laugh.
customer_reviews.text: This was the funniest gag gift I got my girlfriend ever. So cute and then turns into a little bastard. I think her cat loves it even more. Not LOL
customer_reviews.author: Sean Paul Foley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My daughter loves this thing and goes around trying scare everyone.
customer_reviews.author: hdpunk

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Best toy ever, I play with my kids with this thing a few times a week. They laugh every time. I even sometimes scare the wife with it when she walks thru a door. I intended to give this to my kids but I think I play with it more than they do.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Unicorns aren't always happy - and that's ok
customer_reviews.text: Great birthday gift for my occasionally grumpy 7 year old - it fits her personality perfectly :) She enjoyed it and all the other kids wanted one too. Win.
customer_reviews.author: J R  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and cool gift for a cool supervisor!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool gift for my boss on Boss’s day! Quality was better than expected, mechanism for feisty face works perfectly. I did have to do some final fur fluffing and trimming of the mane and tail to make Glenda look like the advertised picture. I am definitely going to buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Pyrakantha

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Delightfully disturbing. I gifted it and it was much loved. Comes in a plastic bag, so you will have to box it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: TinklePitTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The cutest toy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to get a feisty pet for a long time. I finally found ones for loke keys and such. So got one for me and my daughter. When my daughter said she wanted a big one for Christmas, I jumped at that no hesitation. It was the creepiest and cutest critter I'd ever seen. Will be getting another for her for Easter. She will be so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A.

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a niece who is a young adult, but she loves unicorns and has a sense of humor, so I surprised her with this. Hilarious! Had a friends daughter like it so much I bought one for her as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Lasorsa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very unique
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as more of a "gag gift" for my daughter but it ended up being one of her favorite gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Marinucci

customer_reviews.title: Great reactions!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these as gifts and they loved it. Was a little wary giving it to a 2 year old but she just feel in love with it after the first few times. Came in great condition and worked perfectly. Cant wait to see what else to come with!
customer_reviews.author: booga

customer_reviews.title: Feisty Pets are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son saw these on youtube and was terrified yet loved them! He wanted one for his birthday, so I ordered this one. The quality of the product is better than I anticipated and he loves it! Both my kids are already asking for other Feisty Pets!
customer_reviews.author: JMC1046

customer_reviews.title: Glitterpoop
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loves these Feisty Pets, especially Glenda Glitterpoop Unicorn!!
customer_reviews.author: sjf1218

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glenda glitterpoop for Easter. This appears to be a cheap knockoff of the fiesty pets seen in store that are sold in actual packaging. The hair is defective fuzz, super thin and not as pictured. The eyes and mouth have little chips in the plastic on edges and the fur is so thin and mangy, you can see the mesh lining and is also pulled away from where the mouth (that has discoloring) is attached. Complete garbage. My daughter really wanted the one we saw in store, this one is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but the quality is a bit lacking
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but the quality is a bit lacking. I got it as a gag gift for my 18 year old, so it won't be played with but I could see a child breaking it or ripping the fabric pretty easily. If the quality was just a bit better it would totally be a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elbaioumy

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn is a great stress relief
customer_reviews.text: These are hilarious! It's a fun novelty toy I purchased as part of a Halloween costume, but it makes everyone in the family laugh. Good for stress relief it silly fun.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline J.

customer_reviews.title: Glenda Glitterpoop Rocks Socks!
customer_reviews.text: This toy looked too cool for school, and it sooooooo is! Bought this for an amazing friend who abso-tive-ly LOVES it. In fact, she posted to social media that in regard to Christmas gifting, "the bar has been set." My work here is done. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter just had to have this thing. She finds it silly that it can be nice and mean at the same time! She tries to walk up and scare me and my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Novico

customer_reviews.title: I love it but my Neice (1yr) is scared of it. Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Got it for her first Christmas and it was given back due to being a little Too scarey for her.. But I Freakin Love it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and scary
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a girl and she absolutely loves it. It was in good condition, no scratches, functioning properly (was a little stiff when I first squeezed its head, but worked smoothly after that). It is top heavy which can be annoying to get it to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks of Creativity

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my niece's birthday and it was her favorite present! Super cute and menacing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece's birthday and it was her favorite present! Super cute and menacing, just like my niece. lol. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I agree the hair used is a little cheap for the price, not really worth complaining about though. Overall, we absolutely love our feisty pet! Adorable and the face change was pleasantly more dramatic than I was expecting. Would definitely recommend purchase, in other styles too!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Silva

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2, both broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these as Christmas gifts and BOTH of them came in broken/defective. One of them the top set of teeth totally fell out and there's no way to get them back in to where they'll stay and the second one the mouth just stays open unless you close it yourself after letting go of the triggers. Just filed for replacements so we'll see if those two are any better but with having 2/2 broken it's not looking good. Will update my review once I inspect their replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for all little kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old girl. She can’t stop laughing every time you squeeze the head. She loves monsters. Perfect for her.. but other kids have come and saw it and ran
customer_reviews.author: Sinner669

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Freaking adorable! My hubby got this for me for Valentine's day and I loveeee it! It came on time too (lucky him haha) It's perfect and just as described!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and we both love it. I must admit, I played with it before I wrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeann Perez

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. Took her a bit to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. Took her a bit to figure out how to make it change faces but once she did, she was thrilled. These were smaller than I had expected, but they were just fine. A popular toy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: ZombieBaitMaiden

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It is so funny
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is so funny. My granddaughter is going to have a blast chasing her brother around with it. It is still soft and cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rice-Wooden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Glenda Glitterpoop is a great purchase foe the kid that is pretty much over stuffed animals, but not quite. This was a highlight of Christmas for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Ehammie

customer_reviews.title: very cute!
customer_reviews.text: bought for a grandchild who loooooooooooooves unicorns and does not care if they are happy or snappy! She is quite content with this
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Lil girl loved it
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved it had to show everyone at Xmas dinner how the face worked her grandmother (my mom) didn't care for it and I loved that
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: Funny gift.  Daughter will enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for christmas. Daughter is going to love this. Quite funny gift actually.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Greer

customer_reviews.title: ROFL
customer_reviews.text: ROFL... cant wait to give these to my kids... I laughed so hard!
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Dog hated it.
customer_reviews.text: That was fun right up to when the dog ate the face off. Too freaking feisty for a lab.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Ames

customer_reviews.title: Endless entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, she takes it everywhere like a pet and makes videos
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: Was kinda bummed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this feisty unicorn for my 10 year old for Christmas and it is really cute but the face does get stuck on the “feisty face” and sometimes in other positions. She has to manually change it’s facial expressions. She still plays with it and kinda likes it looking Fiesty all the time so we are going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! It isn't a plush animal, but it is definitely unique. I don't care how old you are, you will live playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Liercke

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift but very impressed with the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: SMiller

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute gift for anyone Nicely made True to picture. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jolene gritz

customer_reviews.title: Evil Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Best stuffed animal I have ever owned. I took it to Burning Man, it was a HUGE hit!
customer_reviews.author: Mizchvus

customer_reviews.title: Cute/funny gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for our great niece. It was enjoyed by everyone at out family Christmas party. Everyone thought it was funny.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces so LOVED this gift:) it’s hysterical. I want one now! Hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Gia C. Novembre

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas present EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas present EVER! Even my 13 and 11 year old niece's played with this one! (I bought it for my 6 year old) My daughter still plays with her!
customer_reviews.author: Linds23

customer_reviews.title: Very cute looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Very cute my daughter loves her unicorn. The reason for the 4 stars is that there was a tear going around half the mouth when we received it. It was for Christmas so i didnt have time to return it so i super glued it on and she didnt notice.
customer_reviews.author: CityE

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with little kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a little girl. I was a little nervous that she would be freaked out by it, but she absolutely loves it and it has become quiet the conversation starter with other little friends. No one expects the little unicorn to get grumpy!
customer_reviews.author: Gissel S Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Scary but fun
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old granddaughter was scared at first, now she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: allan bean

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Its soft except in the head because that's where the piece is to squeeze to make the mouth open and eyes change. Other then that its perfect. Exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bayless

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it!!!! I got it for her birthday and she got a good laugh out of it. It's great
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Glitterpoop rules!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah! One of my favorites. We own quite a few of these and Glenda Glitterpoop may be my favorite. Can't wait to see what they come out with next.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping no hassels came just as described my crazy niece loved it
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun and DIFFERENT toy. My daughter loves stuffed animals but they don’t do anything. At least this one has a fun little twist to it. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TargetCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, missing fur
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more starts as my daughter absolutely loves it, but it came with the fur rubbed off the ear and isn't very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gordis218

product_meta.title: Feisty Pets Glenda Glitterpoop the Unicorn that Turns Feisty with a Squeeze
feature_bullets: Glenda measures 8.5" tall and she's a fast one so catch her quickly!
She will go from "awww" to "ahhh!" with a quick squeeze behind the ears
This mystic Feisty Pet is a rare beast! What a lucky find!
Stuffed with polyester fibers and is surface washable
